HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"Why don't women know how to ski? \n\nBecause it doesn't snow between the kitchen and the bedroom."
"Indians are so noisy grrrr"
"@ViriAnaRina @jacfalcon @sonic_meerkat The Irish actually were massacred by the Black and Tans during The Troubles"
"America has always been a Nation of Trannies. "
"some white people hate Mexicans in America but they love vacationing over here"
"RT @Bdickerson20: IF MY SON START BEIN GAY, IM SPENDIN ALL MY SAVINGS TO TAKE HIM TO THE PLAYBOY MANSION. IF THAT DONT WORK IM SUEING AND DISOWNING HIM"
"atheists have the highest rate of suicide & im not trying to make things harder, but maybe if they werent such faggots Jesus would love them"
"God knows I hate ugly butch dykes idc"
"Real refugees don't storm fences and dash rocks at the authorities, they take what they're given with absolute gratitude."
"\"You're exploiting men\"= \"Wahh I'm a man baby and I'm angry that a woman is charging for a service I feel entitled to bc I'm a sexist loser\""
